overview: Being part of a context is a right we often forget, especially when it comes to people on the periphery of existence. Leif Stenberg is the journalist who goes from words to deeds. Together with some men, who for various reasons slipped out of society's normality norm, Leif Stenberg starts a theater. The play they create is shaped right out of the men's life stories. We meet quiet Tore, Christoffer and Olle, who in their lonely lives tell of dreams and longing.
title: I v채ntan p책 ett liv
